name: Asteroid Attack (IAMNICOM)
description:
DISCLAIMER: First of all, I suck at coding. I can do a bit of Javascript, and a bit of HTML and CSS, but mostly I do Scratch (Yes, I know, I know). I just ported this file from Scratch using Junebeetle's experimental sb3 to app converter (link at the bottom), so there's no sound or anything (it didn't convert).

Instructions: Instructions are in-game, click the info tab

Feel free to leave comments and suggestions.

Links:

Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/

My Profile on Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/Misguided_Ninja/ (Please follow me and check out my projects)

Asteroid Attack on Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/301444020/

Junebeetle's sb3 to app converter: http://junebeetle.github.io/converter3alpha/
